Name: Statuette of Amun
Description: Amun is represented striding, with his left leg and left arm put forward; the left arm is lowered. The attributes he originally held in both hands, probably an ankh sign and a scepter, are missing. He wears a short kilt, high feather crown and pleated beard. A line of hieroglyphic inscription is placed on the front, proper right and back side of the base.
